statements: DELETE FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_requirement > 30 AND phosphorus_requirement < 20 OR potassium_requirement = 10;
DELETE FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_req > 100 AND potassium_req < 50;
DELETE FROM fertilizers WHERE nitrogen_content <= 10 OR phosphorus_content >= 20;
DELETE FROM Crop WHERE type = 'Garden' AND optimal_ph < 6.5;
DELETE FROM CropFertilization WHERE date < '2021-01-01' AND quantity > 10.0;
DELETE FROM fertilizers WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Fertilizers';
DELETE FROM fertilizers WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Fertilizers';
DELETE FROM soil_tests WHERE nutrient_id = 3 AND nutrient_level < 1.5;
